name: Planet and Execution
description:
Note: This game is RERO (Release Early, Release Often), an experimental development strategy I'm employing in order to try and actually finish a game. The game receives updates every period (at most about a week) and is then released on this page. The idea is that every iteration of the game is finished and releasable. This doesn't mean the game has an ending, but it means that it is playable in the biggest sense of the word (you can do something). The game simply isn't done until I say it is, but you get access to every development iteration. This is mostly in effort to get myself to finish a game. Thank you for understanding.

Controls: Arrow keys to move the camera

More information will follow later, when the game has reached a later stage.
